description:
• Own and execute end-to-end test strategies for core product modules, ensuring alignment with agile sprint objectives and release timelines
• Enhance CI/CD workflows by integrating automated test suites using Jenkins and GitHub Actions, significantly reducing regression cycle times
• Mentor junior QA engineers by providing guidance on automation frameworks, conducting code reviews, and delivering internal training sessions
• Drive continuous process improvement by streamlining test case management, optimizing test data strategies, and reducing manual testing efforts by 45%
• Taking automation initiatives using Mocha and Javascript with Selenium, achieving over 65% test coverage and improving test reliability and scalability

• Designed and maintained comprehensive test cases and documentation to ensure full test coverage and traceability
• Conducted User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for high-profile clients, ensuring software solutions met business requirements
• Partnered with key clients, including Blackbox, HDFC Ergo, Zuventus Healthcare, Bangalore Airport, Engage2Excel, and others
• Developed and executed automated test scripts using Selenium (Java & JavaScript), Python (Pytest), and Cypress
• Performed in-depth database validation using MySQL, ensuring data integrity and consistency across applications
• Utilized monitoring tools like Grafana and Prometheus to track system performance and identify potential issues proactively
• Managed CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of automated tests
• Maintained version control using Git, ensuring effective collaboration and streamlined code management

• Conducted UAT and End-to-End testing for clients including L&T Technology Services, Inmobi, Bluestar India, Black Box, and others
• Designed comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test execution strategies aligned with product requirements
• Executed manual and automated tests across multiple platforms using tools like BrowserStack and LambdaTest
• Validated software quality at various stages including component, API, feature, and end-to-end testing
• Performed cross-browser and cross-device testing across multiple operating systems
• Collaborated with development, product, and customer support teams to streamline defect resolution
• Coordinated with developers to report, track, and analyze defects, providing actionable insights
• Utilized JIRA for test management, defect tracking, and progress monitoring
• Analyzed application logs and generated detailed test reports to improve testing effectiveness

• Gained hands-on experience in various testing types, including Functional, UI/UX, Acceptance, and Regression testing
• Utilized MySQL to validate front-end data against the database
• Developed an understanding of requirement gathering and test planning processes
• Conducted testing on an Employee Engagement Product with redemption features
• Became familiar with SDLC processes and Agile methodologies
• Enhanced expertise in Non-functional Testing, Manual Testing, and additional QA-related skills
